name: measurement

C2 [ C or U ] the act or process of measuring: The test is based on the measurement of blood levels. The machine makes thousands of measurements every day.
B2 [ C ] a value, discovered by measuring, that corresponds to the size, shape, quality, etc. of something: The measurements of both rooms were identical. What is your inside leg measurement? measurements [ plural ]
Your measurements are the sizes of various parts of your body, especially your chest, waist, and hips, that you refer to when you want to buy clothes: She sent her measurements to the seamstress.
